text: Besnoitia is a genus of apicomplexan parasites. == Life cycle == The life cycle of many of the species in this genus are not known. The life cycle may be complex with various intermediate hosts and vectors including Stomoxys and Tabanidae. == Pathology and effects on the host == Infection with these parasites causes pedunculated lesions in the skin, nasal cavity and larynx of domestic animals. The lesions consist of exophytic nodules protruding from mucosal surfaces. == See also == *Besnoitiosis == References == Category:Apicomplexa genera Category:Conoidasida
title: Besnoitia
